title: Hexakill Connectivity
body: I didn't get in game until 3 minutes in, allied Ahri and Fiddles were constantly disconnecting and reconnecting, enemy Yasuo afk the whole game, enemy Ashe disconnecting during second half of the game. I like the hexakill mod but I feel as though 12 people might be too much for the server.

replies.body:
HI there,

You are in the wrong forum, you should be posting this over at the [PBE forums](http://community.pbe.leagueoflegends.com)!
